item.title: Ratih add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "If you are allergic to a thing, it is best not to put that thing in your mouth, particularly if the thing is cats." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Ratih add a quote by J.R. Ward
Ratih add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Ratih add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Ratih add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Happy Hunger Games! And may the odds be ever in your favor." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Ratih add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "My nightmares are usually about losing you. I'm okay once I realize you're here." -- Suzanne Collins
